thread.title: Watch Ian Connor Review The First Raf Simons Designed Calvin Klein Collection | Highsnobiety
thread.title_full: Watch Ian Connor Review The First Raf Simons Designed Calvin Klein Collection | Highsnobiety

title: Watch Ian Connor Review The First Raf Simons Designed Calvin Klein Collection | Highsnobiety
text:
Subscribe to Highsnobiety on YouTube 
SHOWstudio hosted one of its live panel discussions featuring this time Lou Stoppard, Harriet Quick, Gianluca Longo, Ian Connor and Grace Woodward. The five fashion experts got together to discuss the Raf Simons designed Calvin Klein Womenswear A/W 17 show. The season’s most important collection, simply because it is Raf’s first for the American fashion brand, a lot has already been said about the collection, but as you can imagine, Ian Connor has a rather unique point of view on the matter that is certainly worth checking out. Touching on the lack of knowledge of today’s youth and the importance of actually knowing who is referencing who and where certain inspiration is coming from, the above video is certainly worth watching. Not only is Ian concerned about Raf’s state of mind, he also touches on his disliking of the attitude of Demna Gvasalia of VETEMENTS. Check it out for yourself.
